example[0]: an insurance policy against long-term sickness and injury
example[1]: working days lost due to sickness
definition[1]: the feeling that you are about to bring up food from your stomach, or the act of bringing food up
note[0]: travel/motion/car/sea etc sickness (=sickness that some people get while travelling)
example[2]: Liam had suffered violent sickness and diarrhoea.
definition[3]: the serious problems and weaknesses of a social, political, or economic system
example[4]: He said the idea of ‘success’ was part of the sickness of Western cultures.
